title: Holiday WeWow Day 3: Snow Bonkerballs
description:
In Day 3 of Holiday WeWow, Mindy and Guy Raz are making snowballs! Don't have any snow?! S'no problem! Use baking soda and shaving cream! Head to tinkercast.com for more.
